docker rmi $(docker images | grep none | awk '{print $3}')

title: Basically a single docker file can have stages, first stage builds the thing, second stage copies only needed files to a fresh image. Available since 17.05.0 (currently requires beta channel on Mac)

inline_content.Text: Basically a single docker file can have stages, first stage builds the thing, second stage copies only needed files to a fresh image. Available since 17.05.0 (currently requires beta channel on Mac)

title:
# build stage
FROM golang:alpine AS build-env
ADD . /src
RUN cd /src && go build -o goapp

# final stage
FROM alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=build-env /src/goapp /app/
EXPOSE 80
ENTRYPOINT ./goapp

content_resolved.code:
# build stage
FROM golang:alpine AS build-env
ADD . /src
RUN cd /src && go build -o goapp

# final stage
FROM alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=build-env /src/goapp /app/
EXPOSE 80
ENTRYPOINT ./goapp
